title: Jhin's Color Text
body:
Hey All,

Just a quick heads up.  I was informed Jhin's color text will be shipping Monday (USA PST).   

Hope ya'll like it.


Sorry for the delay, we had more than a couple of unexpected coincidences, which broke our new pipeline.  (Problems with ESRB rating, staff leaving riot, back-up staff sick, another team's staff leaving for vacation, Loc team overloaded with other work, and glorious technical hiccups...    ---it was a journey.) 


I'm gonna set aside a couple hours on Tuesday to answer questions about the story and Jhin.    



-Cheers!

WAAAAAARGHbobo

EDIT:
PS Just checked on it.  Will be live at 5pm PST 


PS
In related news Tahm , Sivir, and Rek Sai's new lores will be shipping soon too!

replies.body:
What's a "color text"?
(I'm German)
"Color Text" refers to the little short story that appears after the bio
Ah. I knew the term "flavor text" but never heard "color text".

Flavour text is more like the stuff you find on item descriptions and such, and is meant to give a bit of information about the thing you're looking at. The Souls games are great at using it. In a sense it gives you a "flavour" of the history behind something.

Colour text on the other hand is something you could say adds the "colour" to the story by giving it proper, in universe context; alright now you've read the bio about X, so now let's see them in action. 

Not sure if it really needed to be said there but I kinda just wanted to say it.
>still confused
Wanted to ask... What about Xerath/Azir long lores? (the "non color text" ones).
They're on the boards...somewhere.
Those are their color text, short stories about a peculiar happening. Not the "didscalic" long lores explaining almost everything about them.
A short story that accompanies a champion's main lore. It's meant to give you a feel for the champion within Runeterra.

For Narrative, we ask that writers have executed to a degree of excellence and have shipped to an audience previously. We have folks from various backgrounds (live action television, animation, novelists, video games etc.)

Well now I'm excited!

Hey WAAAAARGHbobo a question for you: Since you're giving Rek'Sai and Tahm Kench their extended lores, are the champions with a single paragraph all being looked at right now to get brought to the current standard or is this more something you were able to get done personally, being the main writer for these champs? Either way thanks for the update!

So the foundations team is primary on this task.  

I'm on Champion Team, so I write the short stories and bios for the new champs I've worked on (and a few other champs).   
Similarly members Champ-up team are responsible for the bios and stories for remix champs they are/have done. 

But Riot is also releasing a few other stories that I've written -- outside of my normal workflow.  

 I.E. I wrote a Sivir story waaaaay back during the Shurima event-- but we didn't have a release plan, tech, or way to loc it at that time--- 
It will be used as Sivir's color text.  But  I didn't write her long lore-- someone on foundations team did.
